Heartbleed
Team 50s 3307 Group Project. A platformer game where you, the user, is spawned in as a computer bug with the goal of infiltrating and infecting the computer system. Navigate through the terrain, avoid/defeat enemies, enjoy a beautiful soundtrack and attempt to conquer the final boss.

include Directory Reference

Files

 Boss.hpp
 Declares the Boss class, a specialized Enemy with additional behaviors and attacks.
 
 Bullet.hpp
 Defines the Bullet class responsible for managing bullet behavior and rendering.
 
 Collider.hpp
 Defines a collision handling utility class for both sprites and rectangle shapes.
 
 Enemy.hpp
 Declares the Enemy class which handles enemy movement, attacks, health, and AI logic.
 
 Game.hpp
 Declares the Game class which handles the main game loop and rendering.
 
 Player.hpp
 Defines the Player class responsible for player movement, input, bullets, and collision handling.
 
 ScreenState.hpp
 
 Stage.hpp
 Defines the Stage class, which handles tilemap loading, enemy placement, and environment setup from JSON.
 
 Tile.hpp
 Defines the Tile class representing a single tile in the stage with collision and rendering.
 
 UI.hpp
 Defines the UI class which loads and renders UI elements from a JSON tile-based layout.
